#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
   long long int t,k,m,n,a[100000],j=0,i;

   cin>>t;

   while(t--)
   {
      j=0;
    cin>>n>>m>>k;
    int maxi=m;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
       maxi=m;
       cin>>a[i];

       while(maxi>0 && a[i]>=k)
       {
          a[i]=a[i]-k;
          maxi--;
       }

       j=j+a[i];

    }
    cout<<(j%1000000007)<<"\n";
   }
 return 0;
}
